programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E347 Second Chances S1 E347
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E39 Jodha Akbar S4 E39
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Motor Show Geneva
programme.desc: The elegance of an Aston Martin Vanquish met the brute force of a Lamborghini Veneno at the 2013 Geneva Motor Show. There is one thing that united all the super cars at this international event: exclusivity.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.title: Lamborghini Aventador vs GMC Chevrolet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: The "Walk" at JBR in Dubai is the venue for our competition, as far as fancy and luxurious cars from all over the Middle East are concerned. This time, a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet are among the participants.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Audi Sport Quattro S1, Part 1
programme.desc: The Audi Sport quattro S1 is the most powerful and exciting rally car ever built. Based on the regular quattro, the S1 with its giant wings spread anxiety, fear and excitement among rally drivers and fans. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Volvo 240
programme.desc: The Volvo 240T is a typical family car, it's rather heavy, sedate and not sporty at all. But hardly anyone knows that this Swedish car was once the real deal on the rally race track.

programme.title: Tuning World
programme.desc: For more than 20 years the Tuning World Bodensee has been one of the top events in the European car tuning scene. Also: with their i-models BMW started to explore alternative drive technologies. And: taking the Nissan Leaf to Oslo.

programme.title: All New!
programme.desc: Following the Porsche 911's anniversary we take a look back at this iconic model's history. Also: the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with a diesel engine, the Volvo V60. And: safety measures in the car world, from seatbelts to crash tests.

programme.title: Pikes Peak
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Roehrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Can-Am Series 1972
programme.desc: Since 1967 the Canadian American Challenge Cup Series for Group 7 cars had been dominated by the orange machines of the McLaren team. In 1972 however, the Porsche 917/10 appeared, posing a definite threat to the McLaren supremacy.

programme.title: Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Porsche Carrera RS
programme.desc: In the early 1970s the Porsche Carrera RS was the fastest and most agile production sports car in Germany. Today the RS is a Porsche classic with highest acclaim.

programme.title: Mercedes Races again 1954/55
programme.desc: After more than 20 years of abstinence Mercedes-Benz return to the Grand Prix circuit in 1954. With a lot of ambition, the company's advanced engineering and some of the best drivers in the world the Mercedes team aimed for the championship.

programme.title: Walter Röhrl
programme.desc: One cannot talk about rally sports without mentioning the name Walter Röhrl. From an early age, Röhrl showed his talent in rally sports and won the European, World and other international rally championships several times in his career.

programme.title: Hans-Joachim Stuck
programme.desc: Hans-Joachim Stuck is one of the best racing drivers in Germany. Over his long career he not only won the Formula II and several international touring car championships multiple times but also the famous 24-hour race of Le Mans twice.

programme.title: Pikes Peak
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Roehrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Le Mans 1952
programme.desc: The year 1952 saw several premieres at the legendary 24-hour endurance race of Le Mans. After 22 years Mercedes-Benz returned to the famous circuit, and Ferrari started to use factory works team cars for the first time.

programme.title: Bizzarrini 5300 GT
programme.desc: Giotto Bizzarrini was the creator of the famous Ferrari GTO, but after arguments with his employer he left Ferrari early. To get back at Ferrari, Bizzarrini decided to create his own sports car: the Bizzarrini GT 5300.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: Bizzarrini 5300 GT
programme.desc: Giotto Bizzarrini was the creator of the famous Ferrari GTO, but after arguments with his employer he left Ferrari early. To get back at Ferrari, Bizzarrini decided to create his own sports car: the Bizzarrini GT 5300.

programme.title: French Classics
programme.desc: French manufacturers have also built milestones in automotive history in the past, including lesser-known brands such as Delage and Talbot, but also vehicles from Peugeot, Renault and Citroen.

programme.title: Offroad for Everybody
programme.desc: Opel's Insignia Tourer Country was the German brand's first family car in outdoor attire. In addition: with the Capture Renault presented their first compact SUV. And: what happens when Fiat's cute compact 500 is inflated to the 500L Trekking?

programme.title: Open Air Concert
programme.desc: As an homage to driving top-down we took a look at three of the most beautiful convertibles. The animalistic sound of the Audi S3 convertible's 4-cylinder is astonishing. But what about the Nissan 370 Z Roadster? Or Porsche's Boxster GTS?

programme.title: Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Lamborghini
programme.desc: Sant'Agata Bolognese, the home of the iconic Italian sports car manufacturer Lamborghini, is the perfect place to take a look under the hood of the different Gallardo models. Also: cruising through Rome in an Aventador LP700-4.

programme.title: Audi at Le Mans
programme.desc: At the 2012 Le Mans 24 Hours, Audi entered the R18 e-tron quattro for the first time. Also: the Porsche Cayenne GTS, the model between the S and the Turbo. And: the Mercedes-Benz CLS Shooting Brake.

programme.title: Episode 17
programme.desc: The RCN Challenge is the ultimate BMW driving experience. We also paid a visit to the Devils Diner, the track's indoor meeting place for drivers.

programme.title: Episode 18
programme.desc: After the 24-hour race was over we left the Nuerburgring and moved to Büren, Germany, where the Raeder Motorsport company is based. They are famous for front-wheel drives with a great performance that put a lot of horsepower to the track.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Stunt Highlights
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Christoph looks back at the stunts of the last twelve shows and explains why a stunt sometimes works better in a test than on the film set. It's a summary of all the stunts of season 2, in addition to the best outtakes.

programme.title: Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Lamborghini Aventador vs GMC Chevrolet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: The "Walk" at JBR in Dubai is the venue for our competition, as far as fancy and luxurious cars from all over the Middle East are concerned. This time, a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet are among the participants.

programme.title: Sports SUVs
programme.desc: Three extraordinarily sporty SUVs are the Porsche Macan Turbo, the Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and the Audi RSQ3. Each of these is able to easily cope with each season of the year and, in regards to performance, could be mistaken for a sports car.

programme.title: La Dolce Vita
programme.desc: With the Alfieri, Maserati in 2014 celebrated their anniversary with the introduction of a beautiful grand tourer. In remembrance and as part of the three-day celebration, Maserati organised a cruise from Bologna to Torino with some of their most iconic cars.

programme.title: Women and their Classic Cars
programme.desc: A small group of car enthusiastic ladies offers resistance in the otherwise man dominated classic car world. One of them is Johanna. The 24-year-old loves her 1969 Corvette more than everything.

programme.title: Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Sportscars for the Masses
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang has been an icon for decades. What makes this car so special? In addition: the Nissan 370 Z Nismo is half as expensive as a Porsche 911, but its power is on par with the German flagship. And: the 7th generation Volkswagen Golf GTI and R.

programme.title: Electrically into the Future
programme.desc: The Tesla Model S is an icon for inventiveness and boldness. In addition: the BMW i3 was the first car from Germany that completly relied on electric propulsion. And: Citroen gave their glimpse into the future with the DS 5 Hybrid.

programme.title: Ferrari FF
programme.desc: The Ferrari Four, also called Ferrari FF, is the first four-wheel family car from Maranello. Also: the BMW M5 shines both as a family and business car. And: the Mercedes-Benz SL is a roadster drivers' dream.

programme.title: When Sports Meets Indulgence
programme.desc: Luxury class grand tourers with four doors. Porsche introduced their Panamera as a Plugin Hybrid or equipped with new turbo engines. BMW responded with their M6 Gran Coupe. German engineering at its finest.

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Kelleners KS1 RS
programme.desc: The BMW One M Coupe from the former race-driver Ralf Kelleners: the KS1 RS is one of the highlights in 2012. Also: another big score from Porsche, the beautiful 911 cabriolet. And: the Bentley Continental GT V8 is a dream car.

programme.title: Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: BMW Motorrad Berlin
programme.desc: The first vehicle that BMW ever produced was a motorcycle, the R23. We take a look at the brand's motorcycle factory in Berlin. Also: the KTM 125 Duke, a bike that isn't just for beginners. And: the "Night of the Jumps", an exciting freestyle motocross spectacle at Munich's Olympiahalle.

programme.title: Blacktrail E-Bike
programme.desc: The Blacktrail by PG Bikes is the fastest and lightest E-bike in the world, but also the most expensive. What's behind this exciting power package from Regensburg, Germany? Also: is BMW's new flagship bike, the K 1600 GT with 6 cylinders really worth its price and is it able to stand up to the competition by Honda, Kawasaki and Benelli?

programme.title: Episode 22
programme.desc: At the Nuerburgring Patrick chased a 12-cylinder Aston Martin Zagato down the track. Also on the show: a Hummer, a Renault Clio and a Frenchman in a Ferrari.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Fiat Dino
programme.desc: The Fiat Dino Spider is one of the most beautiful cabriolets of the 1960s. Its impeccable design was created by Pininfarina, and only 525 units were built. Under its hood growls a Ferrari V6 engine.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Diesel Engines
programme.desc: It's all about Diesel this time. We compared the BMW 120d and the 125i. In addition: Audi's diesel-hybrid model R18 e-tron quattro dominated the endurance race in Le Mans. And: the diesel-powered Jaguar XF Sport Brake.

programme.title: McLaren MP4 12C GT3
programme.desc: McLaren's MP4 12C GT3 is as fast as a Formula One car. We explored how this super sports car came to be. Also: the German company Mechatronik specializes in restoring rare and classic cars like the Mercedes W111.

programme.title: Supercars of the Frankfurt Motor Show
programme.desc: We took a look at the IAA Frankfurt 2011 highlights, like the new Porsche 911, Mercedes' SLS AMG Roadster, the Bentley Continental Convertible, a 1,100 hp monster from Croatia and others.

programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car On TV
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Classic Cars with All-Wheel Drive
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Type 166 amphibious vehicle is the all-rounder amongst off-road vehicles. Also: the Peugeot 205 Turbo 16 all-wheeler turned the World Rally Championship in the 1980s on its head. And : the Willys Jeep in our drive report.

programme.title: Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: The big journey
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG E63 S is a wolf in sheep's clothing. This station wagon has more power than the Nissan GTR 'Godzilla'. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS feels at home on the motorway and on the race track. And: Audi's powerful all-purpose executive car RS6.

programme.title: Pulse Rising Cars
programme.desc: With the Pulsar, Nissan returned to the European compact class market with a serious contender to the Volkswagen Golf. In addition: the American V8 dream sports car, the Chevrolet Corvette C7. And: Subaru's fifth-generation rally icon, the WRX STI.

programme.title: Mercedes ML 63 AMG
programme.desc: We put the Porsche Cayenne Turbo S and the Mercedes ML 63 AMG to the test. Also: the final round of the truck trial race at the Camp4fun at the Nürburgring in Germany. And: General Motors' new luxury SUV, the Cadillac SRX.

programme.title: Outback Off-Road Adventure
programme.desc: Australia's North-East is famous for its nature and wildlife. We accompanied the Germans Katrin and Uli on their 4x4 tour on the Great Tropical Drive in Queensland. Also: Clash of the Titans. We compared the Toyota Landcruiser and Mitsubishi Pajero.

programme.title: Ready to Race with Ken Block
programme.desc: Whenever Ken Block is involved in the World Rallycross Championship, the audience goes crazy. Thanks to his spectacular “Gymkhana” drifting videos he became a superstar in the motorsports scene. Wherever he shows up, tires are smoking.

programme.title: Harley Sportster 1972
programme.desc: Harley-Davidson add three additions to their model range of bikes: the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, the versatile Switchback Dyna, and the bad-boy ride „Softail Slim“. Also: two German bikers take a dusty adventure ride through Mexico on their BMW's. And: the Triumph Speedmaster, the British answer to Harley-Davidson's cruiser.

programme.title: Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Strong, Light and Fast
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayman GT4 combined the best elements that Porsche could offer. In addition: the Audi R8 V10 plus, an even stronger, lighter and faster version of the original model.

programme.title: Hypercars
programme.desc: The Mc Laren MP4 12C, the Porsche 911 Turbo S and the Mercedes SLS AMG GT are super sports cars that are second to none. We put the pedal to the metal in these exciting and powerful driving machines.

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Four Seatbelts for a Halleluja
programme.desc: The Porsche Panamera Turbo S is one of the most dynamic sedans in the world. In addition: the Jaguar XJR power sedan with a 550 hp V8 engine and Mercedes' extraordinary four-door coupe CLS 500.

programme.title: Wildly through the desert
programme.desc: BMW and the German racing team X-Raid take part in the Dakar Rally with a transformed Mini Countryman. Also: the Mercedes G63 AMG 6x6, a 6-wheel off-road monster. And: the Kia Sportage feels both at home in the rocky terrain of Sicily and the city.

programme.title: Real Winners
programme.desc: When BMW released the X6 in 2008, many people doubted that this concept would be successful. We took a look at the second generation of this model in the M50d version. Also: test driving the best-selling Opel Mokka. And: the Mercedes GLE Coupe.

programme.desc: Giotto Bizzarrini was the creator of the famous Ferrari GTO, but after arguments with his employer he left Ferrari early. To get back at Ferrari, Bizzarrini decided to create his own sports car: the Bizzarrini GT 5300.

programme.desc: The "Walk" at JBR in Dubai is the venue for our competition, as far as fancy and luxurious cars from all over the Middle East are concerned. This time, a Lamborghini Aventador and a GMC Chevrolet are among the participants.

programme.title: Sports SUVs
programme.desc: Three extraordinarily sporty SUVs are the Porsche Macan Turbo, the Mercedes GLA 45 AMG and the Audi RSQ3. Each of these is able to easily cope with each season of the year and, in regards to performance, could be mistaken for a sports car.

programme.title: La Dolce Vita
programme.desc: With the Alfieri, Maserati in 2014 celebrated their anniversary with the introduction of a beautiful grand tourer. In remembrance and as part of the three-day celebration, Maserati organised a cruise from Bologna to Torino with some of their most iconic cars.

programme.title: Women and their Classic Cars
programme.desc: A small group of car enthusiastic ladies offers resistance in the otherwise man dominated classic car world. One of them is Johanna. The 24-year-old loves her 1969 Corvette more than everything.

programme.title: Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Sportscars for the Masses
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang has been an icon for decades. What makes this car so special? In addition: the Nissan 370 Z Nismo is half as expensive as a Porsche 911, but its power is on par with the German flagship. And: the 7th generation Volkswagen Golf GTI and R.

programme.title: Electrically into the Future
programme.desc: The Tesla Model S is an icon for inventiveness and boldness. In addition: the BMW i3 was the first car from Germany that completly relied on electric propulsion. And: Citroen gave their glimpse into the future with the DS 5 Hybrid.

programme.title: Ferrari FF
programme.desc: The Ferrari Four, also called Ferrari FF, is the first four-wheel family car from Maranello. Also: the BMW M5 shines both as a family and business car. And: the Mercedes-Benz SL is a roadster drivers' dream.

programme.title: When Sports Meets Indulgence
programme.desc: Luxury class grand tourers with four doors. Porsche introduced their Panamera as a Plugin Hybrid or equipped with new turbo engines. BMW responded with their M6 Gran Coupe. German engineering at its finest.

programme.title: Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: The Remote Control
programme.desc: Stuntman Tobi operates an Artega GT at full speed via remote control. This is just a warm-up before the big stunt, in which he drives a car up a steep ramp at 68 mph. The question is: How high can remote-controlled cars fly?

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Kelleners KS1 RS
programme.desc: The BMW One M Coupe from the former race-driver Ralf Kelleners: the KS1 RS is one of the highlights in 2012. Also: another big score from Porsche, the beautiful 911 cabriolet. And: the Bentley Continental GT V8 is a dream car.

programme.title: Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: BMW Motorrad Berlin
programme.desc: The first vehicle that BMW ever produced was a motorcycle, the R23. We take a look at the brand's motorcycle factory in Berlin. Also: the KTM 125 Duke, a bike that isn't just for beginners. And: the "Night of the Jumps", an exciting freestyle motocross spectacle at Munich's Olympiahalle.

programme.title: Blacktrail E-Bike
programme.desc: The Blacktrail by PG Bikes is the fastest and lightest E-bike in the world, but also the most expensive. What's behind this exciting power package from Regensburg, Germany? Also: is BMW's new flagship bike, the K 1600 GT with 6 cylinders really worth its price and is it able to stand up to the competition by Honda, Kawasaki and Benelli?

programme.title: Episode 22
programme.desc: At the Nuerburgring Patrick chased a 12-cylinder Aston Martin Zagato down the track. Also on the show: a Hummer, a Renault Clio and a Frenchman in a Ferrari.

programme.title: Episode 21
programme.desc: In this episode, we focused on Phoenix Racing, the successful team from the Eifel Region that rocked the DTM.

programme.title: The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Saalbach Classic 2014
programme.desc: At the 2014 Saalbach Classic rally 80 teams raced their automobile rarities through the Austrian Alps. In addition: rally legend Walter Röhrl in a Porsche 911 RSR at the Cologne-Ahrweiler rally. And: the infamous Group B vehicle category.

programme.title: Turbo Diesel Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Audi's latest generation of TDI engines and their RS5 TDI Concept. In addition we compared the advantages and disadvantages of the two main fossil fuels for cars, gasoline and diesel. And: the 2014 Porsche Cayenne Diesel.

programme.title: Lightweight Cars
programme.desc: The BMW i8 was one of the first sports cars with some sort of a green image. In addition we took two fly-weight sports cars, the Lotus Elise and the Roding Roadster, to one of the most beautiful alpine pass roads.

programme.title: Supercars on the Rocks
programme.desc: Nissan's all-wheel monster GT-R had to prove its winter suitability and the new Porsche 911 with turbo engine was taken to its limits in Finnish Lapland. Also: the Mercedes-Benz S 500 plug-in hybrid.

programme.title: Lightness to the Extreme
programme.desc: The German manufacturer Roding created a car that even outshined the Porsche GT3 with an impressive power/weight ratio. British makes like the Caterham 620 R, Lotus Elise or Radical RXC also showed what's in play in regards to lightweight sports cars.

programme.title: The Fastest Cars in the World
programme.desc: Speed has always been one of the most important criteria when it comes to owning or driving a car. We show you our top 10 list of the fastest cars in the world.

programme.title: The Most Expensive Production Cars
programme.desc: Everyone knows that vehicles made by hand or in small numbers can be extremely expensive. But that can also be true for production vehicles. Here are our top 10 most expensive production cars.

programme.title: The Ambulance
programme.desc: Stunt coordinator Domi’s latest idea for the Stunt Heroes team involves an old ambulance that is prepared so that the stuntman can jump right through the ambulance with his car.

programme.title: Revenge
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes rehearse a car crash scene for a movie, in which it should seem as if the main character of the movie really drives the car. The team achieves this directive by using digital effects and constructing a special airbag.

programme.title: The White Army
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes leave their headquarters and travel to a ski resort. They simulate the attack of an army of soldiers all dressed in white. As part of this scene they want to make a car explode and fly through the air.

programme.title: Porsche GT3 Streetracer
programme.desc: How do you top the already in many ways superior iconic Porsche 911? You come up with the GT3. It's the ultimate melange of road suitability and race track compatibility. And Porsche's RS model is even more intense.

programme.title: Limited Edition
programme.desc: The Tushek TS600, a limited edition super sports car had a power/weight ratio that is on the level of GT3 racing cars. The Bentley Continental GT3-R special edition was also limited whereas McLaren offered their 570S to all customers.

programme.title: The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: 24-hour races are one of the toughest tests for man and machine in motor racing. We present the most successful cars in this racing category in our Top 10 list.

programme.title: The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times
programme.desc: You often get the impression that most cars are the same. But if you are looking for something special, you will find it. We present our top 10 selection of the most unusual modern cars.

programme.title: Mighty Convertibles
programme.desc: The Audi R8 Spyder is the most extreme convertible by the German brand. Also: the Ferrari California T scores with Italian passion and elegant lines. And: AMG's GT C Roadster with its roaring sound is a real bad boy with a touch of luxury.

programme.title: International Motor Show Frankfurt 2013
programme.desc: The stars of the 2013 IAA in Frankfurt were the Aston Martin Vanquish Volante, Porsche's 918 and 911 turbo models and the Jaguar F-Type coupe. Maserati introduced the Ghibli as a competition to Mercedes' E-Class and BMW's 5 series.

programme.title: Classic Cars with All-Wheel Drive
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Type 166 amphibious vehicle is the all-rounder amongst off-road vehicles. Also: the Peugeot 205 Turbo 16 all-wheeler turned the World Rally Championship in the 1980s on its head. And : the Willys Jeep in our drive report.

Former Rookie of the Year, Nick Pagliarulo returns to Kraken for his series premiere as Stadium Championship Series East heads to Tampa.

programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group is reunited with old Native friends who are defending a dam that controls Newmerica's water from talkers. In order to help, Doc and Warren undertake spiritual journeys.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Two years later, things have gotten worse: Warren's apocalyptic dreams continue while the group fights MAD-Zs.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Wyjęte spod prawa
programme.desc: Piękna kobieta porywa młodego lekarza do Lost Valley – miasteczka rządzonego przez kobiety. Mężczyźni mogą tam pracować lub korzystać z saloonu, ale nie mają prawa głosu. Niezależność kobiet jest zagrożona przez gang bandytów i nadchodzące wybory szeryfa.

programme.title: Fuzzy Bohater
programme.desc: Fuzzy i Shoshena przybywają do małego miasteczka Chedron z zamiarem obrabowania lokalnego banku, którego właściciel, De Koven, próbuje przejąć hipoteki wszystkich farmerów w okolicy.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Bronię Się Przed Wrogami
programme.desc: Kilka osób poszukuje trzech jednodolarowych monet, na których wybite są informacje, gdzie jest zakopany skarb.

programme.title: Człowiek z Utah
programme.desc: Szeryf wysyła Johna Westona na rodeo, aby dowiedział się, kto zabija tam jeźdźcówmających wygrać nagrodę pieniężną. Barton zorganizował rodeo i planuje wyjechać z całą nagrodą pieniężną ufundowaną przez mieszkańców miasteczka. Kiedy wydaje się, że Weston pokona jeźdźca Bartona, jego ludzie przygotowują dla niego taki sam los, jaki spotkał innych jeźdźców.

programme.title: Masakra w Wielkim Kanionie
programme.desc: Odnalazłszy zabójców swojego ojca Wes Evans wraca do domu, gdzie zostaje uwikłany w krwawy spór o ziemię.

programme.title: Wysoki Teksańczyk
programme.desc: Pięcioro nieznajomych łączy siły w podróży przez terytorium Komanczów. Po odnalezieniu rannego Indianina poznają sekret ukrytego złota. Wyruszają na poszukiwania, ale chciwość zaczyna ich dzielić. Czy przetrwają próbę?

programme.title: Przyjacielu, Spoczywaj w Pokoju!
programme.desc: Oficer Dove Williams ściga grupę banitów, którzy obrabowali dyliżans w Teksasie.

programme.title: Szlak do Santa Fe
programme.desc: W 1854 roku Jeb Stuart, George Custer i inni absolwenci West Point zostają oddelegowani do Kansas, aby pomóc w pacyfikacji terytorium przed wznowieniem budowy linii kolejowej do Santa Fe.

programme.title: Adios Compañeros
programme.desc: Samotny rewolwerowiec tropi członków bandy, która zabiła jego przyjaciół.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django jest na tropie bandytów, którzy zgwałcili i zabili jego żonę.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Z Bogiem, Gringo
programme.desc: Bracia Cris wrobili Gringo w zabójstwo jego brata, przez co trafia do więzienia z przyjacielem. Gdy prawdziwi mordercy uciekają i porywają Carmen, Gringo rusza w pełne niebezpieczeństw przygody, by oczyścić swoje imię i ocalić ukochaną.

programme.title: Dyliżans
programme.desc: Grupa podróżująca dyliżansem zbliża się do siebie z powodu zagrożenia ze strony Geronimo i przy okazji dowiaduje się więcej o sobie nawzajem.

programme.title: Santee
programme.desc: Jody dołącza do ojca, nie wiedząc, że to przestępca. Po osieroceniu przez łowcę nagród Santee, z którym zawiązuje ojcowską więź, przeszłość powraca – gang odpowiedzialny za śmierć Santee próbuje zniszczyć ich nową rodzinę.

programme.title: Za Zemstę Oddam Życie
programme.desc: Meksykański gang, na którego czele stoi nikczemny Pedro, terroryzuje tereny między Nowym Meksykiem a Arizoną.

programme.title: Egzekucja
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Clips ściga Johna Colera, który oszukał go i zagarnął całe złoto ze wspólnego napadu dla siebie. Clips w końcu dopada swoją ofiarę, ale to nie ten Coler, którego szukał. W rzeczywistości to młodszy brat zbiega, Bill, który pracuje w wędrownym cyrku.

programme.title: Compañeros!
programme.desc: Szwedzki handlarz bronią i meksykański chłop łączą siły, by uratować intelektualnego przywódcę rewolucji. W trakcie misji przytrafiają im się różne przygody.

programme.title: Zwali go Cemetery
programme.desc: John i George McIntire to dwaj naiwni braci, którzy wyjeżdżają do ogarniętego bezprawiem miasteczka na dalekim zachodzie, aby zobaczyć się z ojcem.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: O jednego dolara za dużo
programme.desc: Hazardzista, strzelec i aktor – trzech różnych przestępców z Dzikiego Zachodu łączy niełatwy sojusz w pogoni za skradzionym majątkiem. Czy ich różnice pozwolą im przetrwać i zdobyć 400 000 dolarów?

programme.title: Wojownik z równin
programme.desc: Jim Dancer, były bandyta, staje się szeryfem w Kansas, próbując zacząć nowe życie. Po tragicznych wydarzeniach z przeszłości, przyjmuje tożsamość detektywa Cummingsa. Jako szeryf walczy z przestępczością i korupcją w miasteczku, jednocześnie stawiając czoła zemście Berta Slocuma, brata zabitego przez niego mężczyzny.

programme.title: Skalpy
programme.desc: Dowódca teksańskiego fortu w czasie wojny secesyjnej odmawia poddania się żołnierzom Unii. Próbuje on kupić córkę wodza miejscowego plemienia Indian. Wódz odmawia, a konfederaci wyrzynają plemię i porywają młodą Indiankę. Dziewczynie udaje się uciec. Ukrywa się u ranczera, który nie lubi Indian, ale jeszcze bardziej nienawidzi konfederatów. Ta dziwna para łączy siły, by dokonać ostatecznej zemsty na południowcach.

programme.title: Buddy jedzie na zachód
programme.desc: „Doktor” i Indianin Girolamo trafiają do wioski na Dzikim Zachodzie, gdzie są świadkami terroru ze strony gangu i skorumpowanego szeryfa, który odkrył złoto pod ziemią. Bohaterowie decydują się pomóc mieszkańcom w walce o sprawiedliwość i pozbycie się przestępców.

programme.title: Pełzająca Śmierć
programme.desc: Agent federalny Alan Fields, pod przykrywką Jonathana Pinkertona, pracownika Lloyds of London, prowadzi śledztwo w sprawie napadu na bank, w którym jeden z trzech złodziei zabił dwóch pozostałych, aby wejść w posiadanie wszystkich pieniędzy.

programme.title: Córka Belle Starr
programme.desc: Bob "Bitter Creek" Yauntis zabija Belle Starr i przejmuje gang. Nowy szeryf Tom Jackson zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o jej śmierć przez jej córkę Rose. Aby oczyścić swoje imię i zyskać jej zaufanie, rusza tropem gangu. Western o zemście, odkupieniu i walce o sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Niebezpieczni kompani
programme.desc: Były sierżant Yellowleg ratuje oszusta i planuje napad na bank. Przez przypadek zabija syna tancerki Kit. Postanawia pomóc jej przewieźć ciało przez terytorium Apaczów. W trakcie niebezpiecznej podróży wychodzą na jaw ich prawdziwe intencje i uczucia.

programme.title: Podróżnik z Missouri
programme.desc: Zbiegły sierota, Biarn Turner (De Wilde), próbuje uciec od kłopotów, podróżując na Florydę na początku XX wieku. Trafia do małego miasteczka, gdzie redaktor lokalnej gazety, Doyle Magee (Merrill), postanawia przygarnąć chłopca i dać mu szansę na normalne życie. Zamożny miejscowy farmer, Tobias Brown (Marvin), również interesuje się przyszłością Biarna, ale traktuje młodego człowieka surowo, maskując prawdziwe ukryte uczucia Tobiasa i szczerą troskę. Maniery Biarna i jego chęć niesienia pomocy innym szybko zjednują mu przychylność mieszkańców miasteczka, a on sam udowadnia swoją wartość, przygotowując pozornie niezdolnego do treningu konia do wyścigu, który miasto zorganizuje podczas...

programme.title: Śmierć na Wysokim Wzgórzu
programme.desc: Ważny skok idzie źle, gdy dwaj młodzi mężczyźni stają na drodze meksykańskich bandytów i złego, skorumpowanego biznesmena. Ci będą chcieli odzyskać skradziony łup.

programme.title: Za Kilka Dolarów Mniej
programme.desc: Urzędnik bankowy i jego kuzyn, "generał", łączą siły, by wytropić meksykańskiego banitę.

programme.title: Noc Węża
programme.desc: Hernández, dowódca garnizonu w małej wiosce, dołącza do grupy mieszczan, którzy chcą ograbić młodego chłopca - Manuela - ze spadku.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Yuma to western z 1971 roku, z Clintem Walkerem w roli głównej, wyreżyserowany przez Teda Posta i nakręcony w Old Tucson. Film był pierwotnie pilotem telewizyjnym, który pojawił się w programie ABC Movie of the Week.

programme.title: Wspaniały Teksan
programme.desc: Glenn Saxon, Barbara Loy, Massimo Serato, Gloria Osuna.El Desperado (Glenn Saxon) jest twardym, sprawnie władającym rewolwerem właścicielem saloonu, który pomaga meksykańskim chłopom przeciwstawić się okrutnie uciskającemu ich latyfundyście.

programme.title: Dwa Krzyże w Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy i Alex to rodzeństwo, które ocalało z masakry zleconej przez bezwzględnego Morana.

programme.title: Oklahoma Annie
programme.desc: Właścicielka sklepu angażuje się w walkę z korupcją w swoim mieście, Ma także nadzieję przyciągnąć uwagę przystojnego nowego szeryfa.

programme.title: Niech Żyje Śmierć... Twoja!
programme.desc: Samozwańczy rosyjski książę, meksykański bandyta i radykalna irlandzka dziennikarka łączą siły podczas rewolucji meksykańskiej, by zdobyć bogactwo i sławę.

programme.title: Próba Miłości
programme.desc: Kiedy Charlotte Sutter zostaje porwana przez Apaczów, jej brat Sam, wspomagany przez starego pijanego poszukiwacza, wyrusza na jej poszukiwanie.

programme.title: Nieznajomy na koniu
programme.desc: Sędzia Rick Thorne próbuje wymierzyć sprawiedliwość w miasteczku rządzonym przez potężnego ranczera. Aresztuje jego syna za morderstwo i rusza w niebezpieczną podróż, by zapewnić uczciwy proces. Czy uda mu się pokonać korupcję i zyskać zaufanie Amy Lee?

programme.title: Wybuchowy Joe
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Trumna Pełna Dolarów
programme.desc: Na granicy z Meksykiem trwa frontierska waśń. Bracia banity Hagena zostali zabici przez rodzinę Nevada's Kida.

programme.title: Śmierci na imię Django
programme.desc: Django, pozornie lojalny kat, ratuje skazanych i tworzy „gang umarłych”, by zemścić się na polityku, który lata temu zabił mu żonę. Rozpoczyna się gra pozorów i sprawiedliwości poza prawem.

programme.title: Słodko-gorzki Poniedziałek
programme.desc: Emocjonalne pożegnanie wieloletnich najlepszych przyjaciół prowadzi do nieoczekiwanego romansu.

programme.title: Bez Nakazu
programme.desc: Młody detektyw łączy siły z doświadczonym policjantem pod przykrywką, by rozwiązać sprawę brutalnego morderstwa popełnionego przez gangsterów.

programme.title: Pułapka na ośmiornice
programme.desc: Mężczyzna przeżywający załamanie nerwowe odnajduje jedyną rzecz, bez której nie może żyć i zaraz potem ją traci. Nie może przywrócić kobiety, którą kocha, ale może pokryć ziemię krwią swojego wroga.

programme.title: Samce Alfa
programme.desc: Komiczne spojrzenie na to, jak zachowania mężczyzn i kobiet bardzo mało ewoluowały od czasów jaskiniowców...

programme.title: Prawdziwe oblicze ulicy
programme.desc: Dub, szef gangu narkotykowego, trafia do więzienia i prosi swoją siostrę, by go zastąpiła. Charlotte musi zdobyć szacunek w brutalnym świecie zachodniej strony miasta. Gdy jego ludzie zaczynają ją kwestionować, ona pokazuje, dlaczego to właśnie ją Dub wybrał.

programme.title: Appleton
programme.desc: W wiejskim gospodarstwie rolnym Appleton w stanie Wisconsin nadeszła sroga zima, a do miasta, które kiedyś terroryzował, powróciła zbuntowana postać Mitchella. Maddy Ballister straciła ojca z rąk Mitchella, a teraz jest gotowa, aby go znaleźć i pomścić.

programme.title: Miłość Jest Ślepa
programme.desc: Pewna dziewczyna próbuje odzyskać swojego byłego niewidomego chłopaka, udając inne dziewczyny.

programme.title: Czarny Łabędź
programme.desc: Osławiony pirat Henry Morgan zostaje gubernatorem Jamajki. Wzywa dawnych towarzyszy do walki z korsarzami, by uwolnić Karaiby. Kiedy jeden z nich porywa córkę poprzedniego gubernatora, wojna na śmierć i życie staje się nieunikniona. Morgan zmaga się także z uczuciami do pięknej arystokratki.

programme.title: Szukając łaski
programme.desc: Zmagająca się z trudnościami i na skraju rozpadu rodzina staje przed nowymi wyzwaniami. Wystawią one na próbę ich wiarę w Boga i wiarę w siebie nawzajem.

programme.title: Surogatka
programme.desc: The Surrogate to współczesna opowieść o grupie przyjaciół po czterdziestce z Bay Area, którzy wspólnie przeżywają trudne chwile.

programme.title: Zabójcza Ofiara
programme.desc: Niespełna trzy dekady po porwaniu przez psychotycznego pułkownika Hogana, weteran wojny w Wietnamie i elitarny żołnierz Mike Danton po raz kolejny musi stawić czoła swojemu arcywrogowi. Czy Danton jest wciąż najlepszy?

programme.title: Wzbogać się za Darmo
programme.desc: Trzech młodych akwizytorów z Los Angeles wpada w kłopoty finansowe i postanawiają, że znalezienie skarbu jest najlepszym sposobem na ich rozwiązanie.

programme.title: Z Premedytacją
programme.desc: Czterech niezależnych filmowców zapuszcza się do małego wiejskiego miasteczka na festiwal filmowy i obiecujące spotkanie z dyrektorem filmowym. Zostają wtrąceni do więzienia za ohydną zbrodnię, a nikt nie pamięta wydarzeń z poprzedniej nocy.

programme.title: Królestwo Piachu
programme.desc: Królestwo Piachu. W piwnicy, gdzieś w rozdartym wojną Bagdadzie, zakładnik Adam Smith czeka na śmierć.

programme.title: Clarity
programme.desc: 22-letnia Maggie zapada w śpiączkę, a lekarze diagnozują u niej genetyczną chorobę nerek. Maggie musi otrzymać przeszczep nerki od członka rodziny, który genetycznie idealnie do niej pasuje. Ale Maggie została adoptowana z Meksyku, a wcześniej została porwana i sprzedana bogatej rodzinie. Mając niewiele czasu, jej adopcyjna matka musi znaleźć jej biologiczną matkę i przekonać ją do oddania nerki, żeby uratować Maggie. Czy dwie rodziny z różnych światów mogą uratować umierającą młodą kobietę w jej „końcowym stadium choroby”, nie zatracając tym samym siebie, a może nawet umierając za jej sprawę?
Programista komputerowy staje się coraz bardziej rozczarowany podczas pracy nad projektem mającym na celu replikację ludzkiej inteligencji przy użyciu mapy ludzkiego genomu.

programme.title: Masz rakietę, to do gwiazd!
programme.desc: The Three Stooges przypadkowo startują rakietą i lądują na Wenus. Tam czekają na nich gadający jednorożec, ziejąca ogniem tarantula i komputer, który tworzy ich złe klony. Szalona komedia sci-fi pełna gagów i absurdalnych przygód!

programme.title: Poznaj Hope
programme.desc: Historie miłosne dziadka pouczają mężczyznę i dziewczynę o realiach miłości.

programme.title: Szybcy i Szaleni
programme.desc: Jako dziecko w latach osiemdziesiątych w RPA, Lukas marzy o tym, by zostać mistrzem wyścigów na ćwierć mili. Jego mama mówi mu, żeby trzymał się z dala od tych ludzi, ponieważ są rasistami. Lukas jest zbyt młody, by wiedzieć, co to jest rasista i słyszy to jako "rasista". Film śledzi jego podróż jako młodego człowieka we współczesnej RPA, gdzie ograniczenia wynikające z koloru skóry nie mają już zastosowania... od zera do bohatera w 10 sekund! Z pomocą dwóch szalonych bio-chemików, Lukas będzie ścigał tytuł króla ćwierć mili w Brakpan!

programme.title: Miłość Jest Wrogiem Wielkiej, Głuchej Pustki
programme.desc: Pogrążony w cieniu dwóch dysfunkcyjnych romantycznych związków Hank wkracza w świat depresji przenikającej się z nowymi możliwościami. Kiedy poznaje niejaką Rose, wpadając na nią wiele razy w miejscach publicznych, zaczyna się między nimi romans w sposób, w jaki większość ludzi przeżywa przygodę na jedną noc. Hank walczy o sens życia, jako bezrobotny miłośnik przesypiania całych dni i nieudolny w utrzymaniu funkcjonalnego związku ze swoją byłą narzeczoną, Jill. Dopiero brutalne przebudzenie podczas intymnego wieczoru z Jill sprawia, że świat Hanka całkowicie się załamuje. Kiedy już wydaje się, że nic mu się nie uda, Hank znajduje nowy powód do życia.

programme.title: Pomiędzy Światami
programme.desc: Opowieść o młodym pisarzu, który próbuje pogodzić się z dziewczyną i przetrwać zawiłości nocnego życia stolicy, korzystając jedynie z pomocy swoich imprezujących, dowcipkujących przyjaciół, którzy ciągną go od jednego londyńskiego nocnego lokalu do drugiego.

programme.title: Budząc Davida
programme.desc: Film opowiada o braku komunikacji w całej rodzinie. Reżyser Kevin Nash wprowadza nas w tajemnicę, na którą odpowiedź znają wszyscy bohaterowie, z wyjątkiem Scarlett. Scarlett, z racji swojej natury, jest jednak zdeterminowana, by znaleźć odpowiedzi na swoje otwarte pytania. Ponieważ my, widzowie, szukamy podobnych odpowiedzi, stawia to Scarlett w cennej roli głównej protagonistki.

programme.title: Jej Strona Łóżka
programme.desc: Dwie najlepsze przyjaciółki. Jedna noc. Wszystko się zmienia.

programme.title: Chłopak z Przedmieścia
programme.desc: Niedawny absolwent college'u pogrążony w depresji musi zdecydować, czy będzie realizować swoją pasję, czy trzymać się ochronnej bańki życia w małym miasteczku.

programme.title: Czarny Łabędź
programme.desc: Osławiony pirat Henry Morgan zostaje gubernatorem Jamajki. Wzywa dawnych towarzyszy do walki z korsarzami, by uwolnić Karaiby. Kiedy jeden z nich porywa córkę poprzedniego gubernatora, wojna na śmierć i życie staje się nieunikniona. Morgan zmaga się także z uczuciami do pięknej arystokratki.

programme.title: Masz rakietę, to do gwiazd!
programme.desc: The Three Stooges przypadkowo startują rakietą i lądują na Wenus. Tam czekają na nich gadający jednorożec, ziejąca ogniem tarantula i komputer, który tworzy ich złe klony. Szalona komedia sci-fi pełna gagów i absurdalnych przygód!

programme.title: Bez Nakazu
programme.desc: Młody detektyw łączy siły z doświadczonym policjantem pod przykrywką, by rozwiązać sprawę brutalnego morderstwa popełnionego przez gangsterów.

programme.title: Ben i Ara
programme.desc: Religijne i kulturowe napięcia eskalują, kiedy muzułmanka z Afryki wdaje się w romans z agnostykiem.

programme.title: Obietnice
programme.desc: Dwójka dzieci traci ze sobą kontakt, gdy jedno z nich wyjeżdża do innego miasta. Po latach znów się połączą, nie zdając sobie z tego sprawy. Kiedy uświadomią sobie kim są, będą w stanie wyleczyć rany zadane przez przeszłość.

programme.title: Uwaga Violet
programme.desc: Nagradzany film romantyczny z Cillianem Murphy w roli głównej. Miłośnik kina noir w ekstremalnym wydaniu otrzymuje smak swojego własnego lekarstwa i jego życie zostaje wywrócone do góry nogami przez dziwaczną femme fatale, która ma w planach wielką przygodę. Czasami miłość jest dziwniejsza niż fikcja.

programme.title: Piraci z wybrzeża
programme.desc: Wspaniała, barwna włoska epopeja kostiumowa z Barkerem w roli kapitana statku, który musi zmierzyć się z przebiegłymi piratami. Film ma kilka interesujących zwrotów akcji i mnóstwo niespodziewanych wątków.

programme.title: Kod wieczności
programme.desc: Po dokonaniu rewolucyjnego wynalazku o wielkich konsekwencjach, Bridget odkrywa wady firmy, z którą współpracowała nad prototypem fontanny młodości. Kiedy zrywa umowę i odchodzi, szybko zdaje sobie sprawę, że firma nie cofnie się przed niczym, żeby ją odzyskać. Rodzina Bridget zostaje porwana, żeby wymusić korzystne głosowanie. Cała nadzieja zostaje w nastoletniej córce Bridget Mirandzie i jej sojusznikach: Corey’m (weteranie wojskowym z problemami) i Stephanie (prostytutce).

programme.title: Moje Światełko
programme.desc: Owen jest fotografem cierpiącym na nieuleczalną i wyniszczającą chorobę oczu, która wkrótce doprowadzi go do ślepoty. Zanim całkowicie straci wzrok, wraz z żoną Laurą wyrusza w jedyną w swoim rodzaju podróż do Parku Narodowego Yellowstone. W HD.

programme.title: Gęsto
programme.desc: To opowieść o wschodzącej magnatce nieruchomości THERESIE JAMES, która dla dodatkowych korzyści finansowych prowadzi w swojej dzielnicy nielegalne interesy.

programme.title: Złamany
programme.desc: Zhańbiona gwiazda sportu uzależniona także od hazardu próbuje zmienić swoje życie dzięki wsparciu swojego fana numer jeden.

programme.title: Modyfikowane Dusze
programme.desc: Czwórka młodych ludzi zostaje wciągnięta do alternatywnego wymiaru przez portal w szałasie potów.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Pociąg do Edynburg
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes eskortuje legendarny diament Gwiazda Rodezji pociągiem do Edynburga. Mimo zabezpieczeń, klejnot znika, a syn właścicielki zostaje zamordowany. Holmes, Watson i inspektor Lestrade ruszają tropem zbrodni, prowadzącym do pułkownika Morana – człowieka związanego z Moriartym.

programme.title: W Stanie Krytycznym
programme.desc: W zmieniającym się świecie zorganizowanej przestępczości, Johnny jest niezawodnym cudotwórcą, który chce utrzymać swojego szefa Vincenta na szczycie łańcucha pokarmowego.

programme.title: Przetrwaj albo zgiń
programme.desc: Młoda dziewczyna ucieka przed wojną domową. Przez pomyłkę ląduje w odległej, niezamieszkanej części Australii. Teraz musi dotrzeć jakoś do cywilizacji. Będzie walczyć z głodem, naturą i... Myśliwym chcącym zemścić się na dziewczynie za śmierć syna.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Call of the Forest
programme.desc: There's plenty of drama in this tale of lost gold mines, gallant stallions, and fuzzy bears. Starring Ken Curtis, Robert Lowery, and Chief Thundercloud, this charming little film is highlighted by Karl Struss' stunning photography

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young bank teller is in trouble after a beautiful woman robs the bank. Annie steps in to try and prove the young bank tellers innocence. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: An ex-convict is trying to work as a rancher, but his outlaw brother wants him to resume his life of crime. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. A pair of crooks are aware of the lands value and intend to take it for themselves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which earned a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Annie and the Twisted Trails
programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Looking through an old trunk, Tagg and his friend Johnny Ward, the son of a murdered lawman, find proof that his uncle is an ex-convict and may be involved in a recent bank robbery. programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.
